00011 // contrast.cpp*
00012 #include "tonemap.h"
00013 #include "paramset.h"
00014 // ContrastOp Declarations
00015 class ContrastOp : public ToneMap {
00016 public:
00017         ContrastOp(float day) { displayAdaptationY = day; }
00018         void Map(const float *y,
00019                  int xRes, int yRes,
00020                          float maxDisplayY, float *scale) const;
00021         float displayAdaptationY;
00022 };
00023 // ContrastOp Method Definitions
00024 void ContrastOp::Map(const float *y, int xRes, int yRes,
00025                 float maxDisplayY, float *scale) const {
00026         // Compute world adaptation luminance, _Ywa_
00027         float Ywa = 0.;
00028         for (int i = 0; i < xRes * yRes; ++i)
00029                 if (y[i] > 0) Ywa += logf(y[i]);
00030         Ywa = expf(Ywa / (xRes * yRes));
00031         // Compute contrast-preserving scalefactor, _s_
00032         float s = powf((1.219f + powf(displayAdaptationY, 0.4f)) /
00033                 (1.219f + powf(Ywa, 0.4f)), 2.5f);
00034         for (int i = 0; i < xRes*yRes; ++i)
00035                 scale[i] = s;
00036 }
00037 extern "C" DLLEXPORT ToneMap *CreateToneMap(const ParamSet &ps) {
00038         float day = ps.FindOneFloat("displayadaptationY", 50.f);
00039         return new ContrastOp(day);
00040 }
